comment: Ordinal multiplication with zero. Definition 8.15 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 62. Unlike ~ om0 , this version works whether or not ` A ` is an ordinal. However, since it is an artifact of our particular function value definition outside the domain, we will not use it in order to be conventional and present it only as a curiosity. (Contributed by NM, 1-Feb-1996.) (New usage is discouraged.)
